Create a four-digit PIN that you can easily remember. Don’t share your PIN with anyone.

Welcome back to your financial assistant.\nEnter your PIN to log in.
Follow the steps below to use another M-PESA number with Financial Assistant
1. Ensure that the number you want to use is registered with M-PESA.
2. Insert the SIM card into the empty SIM slot or replace your existing SIM.
3. Reopen Financial Assistant to use your number as desired.
Financial Assistant has detected two phone numbers registered with M-PESA. You can use one or both.
